statements: DELETE FROM vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE speed > 100 AND fuel_level < 0.5;
DELETE FROM VehicleMetrics WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND metric_name = 'Speed';
DELETE FROM IssueLogs WHERE log_id IN (SELECT log_id FROM IssueLogs WHERE vehicle_id = 456);
DELETE FROM EngineHealth WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND rpm < 2000;
DELETE FROM FuelConsumption WHERE vehicle_id = 101 AND distance_traveled > 500
DELETE FROM EngineStatus WHERE engine_temperature < 80 AND coolant_temperature > 90
DELETE FROM EngineMetrics WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND engine_load < 50;
DELETE FROM EngineMetrics WHERE engine_temperature > 100 AND fuel_level < 30
